name: Solo Fighter
description:
Solo Fighter is a single player shooter game.  The goal of the game is to shoot down as many enemies as possible to attain a high score. There are 2 different types of enemies – The first being the ones on the ground , and the other as a bomb releasing airplane. The player must move around to shoot down the enemies as well as to avoid coming into contact with them and the dropping bomb. A player can move around using arrow keys, with each key representing the direction the player moves in. The on-ground enemies have 2 types - The first are presenting at the beginning of the scene_2 and scene_3 which are able to shoot bullets straight to the player. The second are spawn enemies which  will randomly appear at any location around or even right at the player location. If the player comes into contact with any of the enemies or the bomb from the airplane, the player dies and the game over!
Move to the best position, keep an eye on the dropping bomb, avoid touching enemy, and target perfectly, the winner of the battle is YOU!

Thanks for playing!
